name: Race simulation #1
description:
Racing places the rider under some extreme circumstances. High power with low cadence and long threshold efforts are just some examples of what you will experience racing. 



This is a race-simulation session, with intervals representing a race that works on your threshold power. You will get a taste of racing, but you will also get a good training benefit.
